Madis, a former boxer and bank robber, is released from prison after having spent half his life behind bars. He decides to start over and spend his old age in the country with a woman with whom he had been corresponding. Before he sets off, he pays his sister a visit and meets his nephew Hannes, 14, an introverted boy who is constantly bullied in school. Madis is amused by Hannes and takes him along on his trip.
